channel.title: [PI] Adding a special bar for a weapon
channel.description: How do you make the special bar show up on a weapon? I've added the item to the addSpecialBar method in ItemAssistant, but the bar doesn't show up on the sidebar interface. Is there anything else I need to do?

item.title: [PI] Adding a special bar for a weapon
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

How do you make the special bar show up on a weapon? I’ve added the item to the addSpecialBar method in ItemAssistant, but the bar doesn’t show up on the sidebar interface. Is there anything else I need to do?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding a special bar for a weapon
